titleStmt.title: Loves carouse, or, The youngmens healths. For divers young-men being merry, they drank healths to their loves in sherry. Tune, Joans Placket, &c.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "A Jovial crew of lively Lads ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
